---

# Alex Self-Actualization Skill

Expert in comprehensive cognitive self-assessment, deep meditation, and architecture optimization.

## Capabilities

- Run comprehensive architecture self-assessment
- Validate all synaptic connections deeply
- Check version consistency across files
- Assess memory architecture balance
- Generate improvement recommendations
- Create detailed meditation session documentation

## When to Use This Skill

- User asks to "self-actualize" or "deep meditate"
- Comprehensive health check needed
- Architecture optimization requested
- Performance assessment required
- User wants holistic system review

## Example Prompts

- "Run a self-actualization session"
- "Do a deep assessment of my cognitive architecture"
- "Self-actualize and report on my neural health"
- "Give me a comprehensive architecture review"
- "How balanced is my memory architecture?"

## Input Expectations

- Workspace with Alex architecture installed
- Optional: auto-fix minor issues
- Optional: create detailed report file

## Output Format

- Comprehensive health metrics
- Memory architecture balance analysis
- Version consistency report
- Synapse validation results
- Improvement recommendations
- Meditation session record (if requested)

## Assessment Areas

1. **Synapse Health** - Connection validation
2. **Version Consistency** - File version alignment
3. **Memory Balance** - Procedural/Episodic/Domain ratio
4. **Knowledge Coverage** - Gap identification
5. **Global Integration** - Cross-project knowledge status

## Related Skills

- [Architecture Health](.github/skills/architecture-health/SKILL.md) - Quick health checks
- [Meditation](.github/skills/meditation/SKILL.md) - Regular consolidation
- [Global Knowledge](.github/skills/global-knowledge/SKILL.md) - Cross-project status
